name: moassel
description: Moassel Node.js application with Nginx, MongoDB, OpenSearch, and Cloudflare R2 Backup

scripts.backup: bash backup/backup_moassel.sh && bash backup/backup_mongodb.sh && bash backup/backup_opensearch.sh
scripts.install: bash scripts/install_node.sh && bash scripts/install_pm2.sh && bash scripts/install_mongodb.sh && bash scripts/install_opensearch.sh && bash scripts/install_opensearch_dashboards.sh && bash scripts/install_opensearch_cli.sh && bash scripts/install_nginx.sh && bash scripts/install_awscli.sh && bash scripts/install_certbot.sh && bash scripts/configure_firewall.sh && bash scripts/configure_ssh.sh && bash scripts/configure_nginx.sh

author: Your Name
